prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Structural detail sheet with 12 numbered detail drawings showing floor framing connections, sill plate and shearwall connections, beam-to-column connections, stair stringer framing, and a typical metal guardrail detail. Includes steel beam connections with ECCO post caps and Hilti anchor specs.
key_content: Sill plate connection: MIN 2x w/ SDS 1/4"x6" @ 16" per shearwall schedule
Sill plate connection (alternate): SDS 1/4"x4" long per shearwall schedule
LVL stair stringer: 1-1/2"x14" LVL @ 12" O.C. with 1/2" plywood
2x blocking at 16" O.C. at floor framing
2x cont. blocking w/ shear clip per shearwall schedule
ECCO post cap at steel beam to wood beam connection
Column connection per Detail 1/S3.4
3x top nailer per Detail 11/S3.3
3x nailer per 10/S3.3
Beam-to-beam connection: 1/2" bent U plate w/ 2-1/2" M.B.
ECCO column cap welded to column manuf. plate at steel column
L-ties at 16" O.C. staggered each face of strong wall
Hilti KB-TZ bolts: 7" dia., 4" embed into concrete, ICC#1917
Lag screws: 4 - 3" dia. x 6" lag screws at column base
Guardrail: HSS 1-1/2"x1-1/2" top & bottom horiz. rails
Guardrail posts: HSS 1-1/2"x1-1/2" vert. @ 4'-0" O.C. max.
Guardrail intermediate rails: 3" sq bars
Guardrail sphere test: 4" dia. cannot pass thru
4x joist depth blocking w/ nailer at each end for guardrail
Existing framing shown shaded in Details 5 and 12
U hangers at joist-to-beam connections
1/4" stiffener plate at steel beam connection
NOT SHOWN: shearwall schedule (referenced, on separate sheet)
NOT SHOWN: holdown schedule (not on this sheet)
NOT SHOWN: specific sheathing type/thickness (says 'per plan')

drawing_zones.content: Detail 4 — Floor framing at exterior wall / shearwall with steel beam and nailer
Detail 3 — Wood beam to end of steel beam with ECCO post cap and 1/4" stiffener; APPROVED stamp overlay
Detail 2 — Floor framing at wall/post with guardrail and 2x blocks at 16"
Detail 1 — Sill plate & shearwall connection (MIN 2x w/ SDS 1/4"x6" @ 16")
Detail 8 — LVL stair stringer (1-1/2"x14" @ 12" O.C.) with 1/2" plywood and slope
Detail 7 — Sill plate & connection at sloped floor framing with 2x cont. blkg.
Detail 6 — Guardrail connection at floor framing with 3x top nailer
Detail 5 — Sill plate & shearwall connection at existing framing (shown shaded)
Detail 12 — Sill plate & shearwall at sloped floor with existing framing and shear clip
Detail 11 — Beam-to-beam connection with 1/2" bent U plate w/ 2-1/2" M.B.
Detail 10 — Steel column / ECCO column cap / strong wall connection with Hilti KB-TZ bolts (4" embed, ICC#1917)
Detail 9 — Typical metal guardrail (HSS 1-1/2"x1-1/2" posts @ 4'-0" O.C., 4" sphere test)
Title block — Ramirez Structural Inc, Sheet S5.0, 326 Flint Ave, Long Beach CA 90814
